title: Woebsejohannes123
author: Woebsejohannes123
content: Hey!!!My name is Johannes-Hermann Wöbse,i just wanted to ask weather its possible to get a loan for a decent Mining Rig???Or can someone help me and tell me what to do, i mean i am not unmineable, its paying out usually i think!!!Feel free!Greetings!!!JohannesP.s. its just a little hug with me and my money for the first time again...

comments.author: shasan
comments.body: Quote from: Woebsejohannes123 on September 19, 2022, 04:28:46 PMHey!!!My name is Johannes-Hermann Wöbse,i just wanted to ask weather its possible to get a loan for a decent Mining Rig???Or can someone help me and tell me what to do, i mean i am not unmineable, its paying out usually i think!!!Feel free!Greetings!!!JohannesP.s. its just a little hug with me and my money for the first time again...Before saying to you whether you are able to get a loan from the forum members or not I want to ask a question. Would you like to fund anyone who is a stranger or who asks for funds at the street whom you have never met? If the answer is yes then you may expect that you may get a loan from here but if your answer is no then obviously you will not get any funds from the forum.
